info.name: Firefox Translucent Dialogs for Mac
info.description: Adds vibrancy effect to dialog windows on OS X 10.10 and later.
info.additionalInfo: UPDATES 2016/02/01 â€¢ Original release ADVICES Only works with OS X 10.10 or later, does not works with Windows and Linux-based systems. For Windows 7 users, this userstyle by Hj-kos provides a similar effect based on Aero Glass transparency effect to dialog windows: https://userstyles.org/styles/11707/glass-dialogs-firefox-3-1

data.title: Can you make one for the nav bar?
